title: Why does Allah call Himself WE in the Quran? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: why does Allah call himself we in the Quran the pronoun pronoun we is used for a group usually and in Arabic language and also in other languages such a pronoun can be used when an individual is glorifying himself so the Kings the presidents the dignitaries when they issue an order they say we decree that such and such ruling should be imposed or implemented on a country or or a region Etc they use the pronoun we as a form of glorification and this is well known in Arabic and Allah azzawajal definitely is the most worthy of such glorification Allah Knows Best
